backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component switching between landing and player views based on persisted video URL state.
frontend/src/components/EmbedFallback.ts: Component that renders iframe embeds when available or shows a fallback alert with a link to open externally.
frontend/src/components/LandingHero.tsx: Hero landing section with branding, descriptive text, and the video URL input form.
frontend/src/components/LayoutShell.tsx: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer styling.
frontend/src/components/PlayerView.tsx: Video player page with editing controls, share-link copy actions, and video rendering.
frontend/src/components/VideoLinkForm.ts: URL input form with validation, error handling, and submit button for loading a video.
frontend/src/components/VideoRenderer.ts: Determines whether to render an HTML5 video player or an embed fallback based on URL type.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity loading using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useShareVideoUrl.ts: Manages a shareable video URL via state and syncs it with the browser query parameter.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a warm color theme with light and dark mode variables.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Copies text to the clipboard using the native API with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates and normalizes video URLs, enforcing protocol rules and attempting protocol autocompletion.
frontend/src/lib/videoUrl.ts: Detects video link type and generates embed URLs for common platforms like YouTube, Vimeo, and Twitch.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, themes, and plugins for typography and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, features, and requirements for a website that plays shared video links.
